Title: rWPF
Description: WPF User Controls, ValueConverters and Helpers for UI Development
HomeWiki:
rWPF

This is the source hub for the rWPF libary, containing some useful UI Elements and Converters.


How to use

Releases are published via NuGet. Install rWPF using:

PM> Install-Package rwpf


Declare in XAML the rwpf namespace and you're ready to go:

<Window xmlns:r="http://rwpf.codeplex.com" ...>
  ...
  <StackPanel>
    <r:IPv4Field IP="{Binding IP}" />
    <r:IPv4Field IP="{Binding Mask}" NetmaskOnly="true" />
  </StackPanel>
  ...
</Window>


See Documentation for a quick summary of all Controls and Converters
